title: Enhanced electrocatalytic performance of bismuth-doped zinc stannate towards OER and HER through oxygen vacancies: p-block metal ion doping empowering d-block
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00552J, Paper
Reshmi T. Parayil, Santosh K. Gupta, Kalpana Garg, Sangeeta Jangra, Soumen Samanta, K. Sudarshan, M. Mohapatra, Tharamani C. Nagaiah
Bismuth ion doping in zinc stannate was found to be a better strategy for electrocataysis of OER and HER compared to doping with transition metal ions such as Mn, Fe and Co.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
